data.name: Invincible_Desc
data.value: Disables all damage to the player character.

data.name: EnableHotkeys_Desc
data.value: Enable cheat hotkeys in inventory screen, party screen, clan screen etc.

data.name: MapSpeedMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the speed of the player on the map is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default speed.

data.name: ExtraInventoryCapacity_Desc
data.value: Extra inventory capacity for the player party.

data.name: MapVisibilityMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the visibility range of the player on the map is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default visibility. WARNING: Will negatively affect performance!

data.name: PartyInvincible_Desc
data.value: Disables all damage to members of the player's party.

data.name: PartyOneHitKill_Desc
data.value: Party members kill enemies with one hit.

data.name: PartyOnlyKnockout_Desc
data.value: Party members are never killed, only knocked unconcious.

data.name: RenownRewardMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the renown reward after a won battle or tournament is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default renown.

data.name: InfluenceRewardMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the influence reward after a won battle is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default influence.

data.name: AlwaysWinBattleSimulation_Desc
data.value: Enemies do no damage to the player party in combat simulations.

data.name: NoTroopSacrifice_Desc
data.value: No troop sacrifice when running from an enemy or breaking a siege.

data.name: NoRunningAway_Desc
data.value: Troops in the player's party do not run away during combat.

data.name: EnemiesNoRunningAway_Desc
data.value: Enemies never run away during combat.

data.name: BanditHideoutTroopLimit_Desc
data.value: Additional troops that can join the player in hideout battles. A value of 0 means default troop limit.

data.name: AlwaysCrushThroughShields_Desc
data.value: Your strikes always crush through enemy shields.

data.name: ExtraPartyMemberSize_Desc
data.value: Increase the maximum size for the player party.

data.name: ExtraPartyPrisonerSize_Desc
data.value: Increase the maximum amount of prisoners travelling with the party.

data.name: ExtraPartyMorale_Desc
data.value: Increase morale of the player party.

data.name: FoodConsumptionPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much food the player party needs. 100% means full food consumption, 0% means no food consumption.

data.name: TroopWagesPercentage_Desc
data.value: Percentage of the original troop wages that the player must pay. 100% means full wages, 0% means no troop wages.

data.name: FreeTroopUpgrades_Desc
data.value: Player party troop upgrades are free.

data.name: PartyHealingMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the party healing rate is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default healing.

data.name: ExtraCompanionLimit_Desc
data.value: Increase the maximum amount of companions in your clan.

data.name: ExtraClanPartyLimit_Desc
data.value: Increase the maximum amount of parties in your clan.

data.name: KingdomDecisionWeightMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the likelihood to win ('weight') of the kingdom decision vote the player supports is increased.

data.name: NoRelationshipLossOnDecision_Desc
data.value: Do not lose relationship points with people on the opposing side of the player's vote.

data.name: ExperienceMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the experience gain of the player is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default experience.

data.name: LearningRateMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the learning rate of the player is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default learning.

data.name: TroopExperienceMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the experience gain of the player's troops is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default experience.

data.name: SiegeBuildingSpeedMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the speed of siege engine construction on the player party's side is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default build speed.

data.name: ArmyCohesionLossPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much cohesion the army the player party has joined loses. 100% means full cohesion loss, 0% means cohesion is frozen.

data.name: ArmyFoodConsumptionPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much food the the army the player party has joined needs. 100% means full food consumption, 0% means no food consumption.

data.name: OneDayConstruction_Desc
data.value: Buildings in player settlements are constructed in one day.

data.name: SmithingEnergyCostPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much energy smithing, smelting or refining costs. 100% means full energy cost, 0% means no energys cost.

data.name: SmithingDifficultyPercentage_Desc
data.value: How difficult a weapon design is. 100% means full difficulty, 0% means no difficulty.

data.name: SmithingCostPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much material crafting a weapon costs. 100% means full material cost, 0% means no materials cost.

data.name: CraftedWeaponHandlingBonus_Desc
data.value: Bonus that is applied to the Handling value of any weapon the player crafts.

data.name: CraftedWeaponSwingDamageBonus_Desc
data.value: Bonus that is applied to the Swing Damage value of any weapon the player crafts.

data.name: CraftedWeaponSwingSpeedBonus_Desc
data.value: Bonus that is applied to the Swing Speed value of any weapon the player crafts.

data.name: CraftedWeaponThrustDamageBonus_Desc
data.value: Bonus that is applied to the Thrust Damage value of any weapon the player crafts.

data.name: CraftedWeaponThrustSpeedBonus_Desc
data.value: Bonus that is applied to the Thrust Speed value of any weapon the player crafts.

data.name: PerfectRelationships_Desc
data.value: All relationships between the player and other characters are set to 100.

data.name: BarterOfferAlwaysAccepted_Desc
data.value: Barter offers are always acceptable to other characters.

data.name: ConversationAlwaysSuccessful_Desc
data.value: Conversation and persuasion attempts always succeed.

data.name: FreeTroopRecruitment_Desc
data.value: Recruits from settlements join the player party for free.

data.name: NoBarterCooldown_Desc
data.value: No cooldown between bartering attempts with a character.

data.name: NpcMapSpeedPercentage_Desc
data.value: Slow down NPC parties on the map to a percentage of their original speed. A value of 100% means default speed, 50% means half speed, 0% means they cannot move.

data.name: PartyInvisibleOnMap_Desc
data.value: Hostile parties will not track or attack the player party on the map.

data.name: InstantEscape_Desc
data.value: Player escapes instantly after being caught by another party.

data.name: HealthRegeneration_Desc
data.value: The player character regenerates the set percentage of his total health every second during combat. A value of 0% means no regeneration.

data.name: InfiniteAmmo_Desc
data.value: Ranged and thrown weapons have infinite ammunition.

data.name: EnemySiegeBuildingSpeedPercentage_Desc
data.value: How quickly the opposing side in sieges can build siege engines or wall defenses. 100% means full speed, 0% means no siege engines at all.

data.name: DamageMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the damage dealt by the player during combat is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default damage. If One Hit Kill is active, this has no effect.

data.name: EnemyOnlyKnockout_Desc
data.value: Enemies are never killed, only knocked unconcious.

data.name: NoFriendlyFire_Desc
data.value: Completely disable friendly fire for the player party.

data.name: PartyDamageMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the damage dealt by the player party members during combat is multiplied. A factor of 1 means default damage. If Party One Hit Kill is active, this has no effect.

data.name: PartyInfiniteAmmo_Desc
data.value: Ranged and thrown weapons of player party members have infinite ammunition.

data.name: DamageTakenPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much damage the player takes on each hit. 100% means full damage, 50% means half damage, and 0% makes the player invincible.

data.name: ItemTradingCostPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much items cost to buy from traders. 100% means full price, 50% means half price, and 0% means everything is free.

data.name: SellingPriceMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Factor by which the price of items sold by the player is increased. A factor of 1 means default price.

data.name: PartyDamageTakenPercentage_Desc
data.value: How much damage player party members take on each hit. 100% means full damage, 50% means half damage, and 0% makes them invincible.

data.name: DailyFoodBonus_Desc
data.value: The food stocks in player owned castles and cities grow by the configured value every day.

data.name: DailyGarrisonBonus_Desc
data.value: The garrison in player owned castles and cities grows by the configured value every day.

data.name: DailyMilitiaBonus_Desc
data.value: The militia in player owned villages and cities grows by the configured value every day.

data.name: GarrisonWagesPercentage_Desc
data.value: Percentage of the original garrison wages that the player must pay. 100% means full wages, 0% means no troop wages.

data.name: PartyHealthRegeneration_Desc
data.value: Player party members regenerate the set percentage of their total health every second during combat. A value of 0% means no regeneration.

data.name: DailyHearthsBonus_Desc
data.value: The hearths in player owned villages grow by the configured value every day.

data.name: DailyLoyaltyBonus_Desc
data.value: The loyalty in player owned castles and cities grows by the configured value every day.

data.name: DailyProsperityBonus_Desc
data.value: The prosperity in player owned castles and cities grows by the configured value every day.

data.name: DailySecurityBonus_Desc
data.value: The security in player owned castles and cities grows by the configured value every day.

data.name: CombatZoomMultiplier_Desc
data.value: Increase the zoom level during combat. 1 means default zoom.

data.name: InstantCrossbowReload_Desc
data.value: If enabled crossbow reloading is almost instant.

data.name: NeverRequireCivilianEquipment_Desc
data.value: Allows you to enter any mission with your battle gear.

data.name: FreeFocusPointAssignment_Desc
data.value: Assigning focus levels to a skill does not cost focus points.

data.name: NoCrimeRatingForCrimes_Desc
data.value: Illegal actions do not result in a crime rating.

data.name: PartyHeroesInvincible_Desc
data.value: Disables all damage to hero members of the player's party. Does not affect normal troops.

data.name: ExtraClanPartySize_Desc
data.value: Increase the maximum amount of troops in parties of your clan.
